Generate or Load a JSON Schema Document

Source: R/document_schema.R
document_schema.Rd

Generates a JSON schema document dynamically based on an R object or loads a predefined schema template from the package.

Usage

document_schema(r_object = NULL, save_to = NULL)

Arguments

r_object

(Optional) An R object to derive a JSON schema from. If NULL, a boilerplate schema is returned.

save_to

(Optional) File path to save the generated schema. If NULL, the schema is returned as a list.

Value

A JSON schema as a list if save_to is NULL; otherwise, saves the schema to the specified file.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
  # Generate a schema from an R object
  schema <- document_schema(list(id = 1, name = "Alice"))
  
  # Generate a boilerplate schema
  schema <- document_schema()
  
  # Save the schema to a file
  document_schema(list(id = 1, name = "Alice"), save_to = "user_schema.json")
} # }
